cyber-dojo.sh:
rm -f *.class
CLASSES=.:`ls /mockito/*.jar | tr '\n' ':'`
javac -Xlint:unchecked -cp $CLASSES  *.java
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
  java -cp $CLASSES org.junit.runner.JUnitCore `ls -1 *Test*.class | grep -v '\\$' | sed 's/\(.*\)\..*/\1/'`
fi
output:
ls: cannot access *Test*.class: No such file or directory
JUnit version 4.11-SNAPSHOT-20120416-1530

Time: 0.001

OK (0 tests)
